com.hush.pgp
Class CommandLinePgp

java.lang.Object
  com.hush.pgp.CommandLinePgp
All Implemented Interfaces:
PgpConstants
public class CommandLinePgp
extends java.lang.Object
implements PgpConstants

This classes allows various command line operations to be performed. The options parallel GnuPG to a certain extent. This class is currently suitable only for the purpose of debugging the overall OpenPGP implementation.
